snippet: The British-German troupe Gob Squad returns to the Public Theater with two shows that rely on the audience or passers-by to work.
abstract: Performance collective Gob Squad presents plays Super Night Shot and Gob Squad's Kitchen as part of the Public Theater's Under the Radar Festival.
lead_paragraph: The British-German troupe Gob Squad returns to the Public Theater with two shows that rely on the audience or passers-by to work.

headline.seo: Gob Squad Returns to the Public Theater
headline.main: These Actors Think You Can Probably Do It Better Than They Can
headline.print_headline: These Actors Think You Can Probably Do It Better Than They Can
